name: Moderation
description: Configuration for moderation settings and role management in the bot.

appealLink.name: Appeal Link
appealLink.description: Link for users to appeal moderation actions.

autoModEnvProtection.name: Auto Mod Environment Protection
autoModEnvProtection.description: Enable or disable automatic environment protection by the moderation bot.

memberRoleID.name: Member Role ID
memberRoleID.description: Role ID assigned to regular members.

stickyRoles.name: Sticky Roles
stickyRoles.description: Enable or disable sticky roles for members.

staffRoleIDs.name: Staff Role IDs
staffRoleIDs.description: List of role IDs assigned to staff members.

inviteLinkProtection.name: Invite Protection
inviteLinkProtection.description: When enabled you will receive a DM when someone changes your server's custom invite link.
